column4: guys I have a small problem now.  I have downloaded the desktop CD and I have booted my computer from it.  I have a black screen with white text and it says welcome to yaboot.  how do i install from this?
what cd did you download? and from where?
that would be to install ubuntu. But like I say where did you download this cd from? hopefully ubuntu.com
you should check out help.ubuntu.com while you install
